name: Bioshock Apartment
description:
The project is based on the Nostalgia prompt for the Search for a Star competition 2022. Personally, I chose Bioshock as my base as it is a game that marked me during my teenage years. 

It has always fascinated me, so I'm very happy I finally got to build a homage to it. Showcased on UE 4. and built mainly on Blender, Substance Suite and Houdini.

I started playing it years after its release and still, its world absolutely fascinated me. Raptures architecture is Art Deco mixed with Art Nouveau, this gives it its very unique style, very rarely found in real life. 

Check it out too in ArtStation or visit my profile Nepre.
